name: CVE-2017-8558
description: The Microsoft Malware Protection Engine running on Microsoft Forefront and Microsoft Defender on 32-bit versions of Microsoft Windows Server 2008 SP2 and R2 SP1, Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows Server 2012 Gold and R2, Windows RT 8.1, Windows 10 Gold, 1511, 1607, and 1703 does not properly scan a specially crafted file leading to memory corruption. aka "Microsoft Malware Protection Engine Remote Code Execution Vulnerability".
pattern: [((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:windows_defender:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_10:1607:*:*:*:*:*:x86:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_7:-:sp1:*:*:*:*:x86:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_10:-:*:*:*:*:*:x86:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_10:1511:*:*:*:*:*:x86:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_10:1703:*:*:*:*:*:x86:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_8.1:-:*:*:*:*:*:x86:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:-:sp2:*:*:*:*:x86:*')) OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:forefront_endpoint_protection:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:security_essentials:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:forefront_endpoint_protection:2010:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:endpoint_protection:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:windows_intune_endpoint_protection:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')]
